name: FAREWELL FORMAT
description:
Experimental Comics X Games platformer.

Control with your computer.

Try it fullscreen.

By KELLY K and DROQEN.

Please check out TCAF; this game was made for Hand Eye Society's Comics X Games jam, and Kelly and I both have tables in the Spring Canzine section! I'm in chop city, and Kelly K is at the bottom of the glue grotto.

droqen: special thx to quasiotter for your great playtest video! <3
